name: R3TRO (Pre Alpha 3)
description:
A WIP indie platformer (planned to be puzzle) game developed by myself.

Updates will hopefully be finished in the next few weeks so I can get a game that is actually playable, this was only done in a few hours so there are probably a lot of bugs.

This is not planned to be an actually released game, rather it is a project I am using to learn how the Unity engine works with C#.
